Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Explore a case study in building safer smarter cities | STUDIOSP65
Tags: Explore a case study in building safer smarter cities | STUDIOSP65
Description:
Join Andrew Hester from the City of Raleigh, NC, as he showcases how the City of Raleigh is leveraging real-time geospatial analytics with Vision AI to reduce pedestrian near-misses, protect field crews, and accelerate emergency response at dangerous intersections. Learn how automated alerts and unified data empower city leaders to make faster, smarter decisions for safer, more resilient communities. Powered by Esri, Microsoft, and NVIDIA.
